casebody.data:
No. D-2781. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Steven Gene BERRY.

Steven Gene Berry, of Bethesda, Maryland, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
